name: The Narzissenkreuz Adventure
title: The Narzissenkreuz Adventure
desc: "Before you arrived, I had a dream. I dreamed that I was a small, brave Oceanid, and we set out to save the Princess..."

skills.desc:
If you have multiple characters of the same Elemental Type, then heal your most damaged character for 1 HP.
If you have multiple characters that use the same type of weapon, then draw 1 card.
If you have characters that belong to the same faction, then Adventure once.
